alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 2:30AM CDT until July 21 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Smith County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 230 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belinda City, or near Lebanon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Mount Juliet, Watertown, Gordonsville, Rural Hill, Belinda City, Hickman, Alexandria, Liberty, Auburntown, Tuckers Crossroads, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park and Gladeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 227 and 260. Interstate 840 between mile markers 66 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
